title: First Trimester Pregnancy Exercises | 30 Minute Pregnancy Workout First Trimester
description:
Today we are doing first trimester pregnancy exercises! These are designed to give you more energy and relieve any nausea from morning sickness. I hope you feel great after this 30-minute pregnancy workout for first trimester. I have provided safe modifications for second and third trimester as well. 

Guide to cope with pain in labor: http://bit.ly/31MnU5Q 
Pregnancy Meal Plan: https://landing.mailerlite.com/webforms/landing/w5v4m5
Pelvic Floor Guide For Birth Prep: https://landing.mailerlite.com/webforms/landing/n1q6t1
Pregnancy Yoga Cards: https://landing.mailerlite.com/webforms/landing/z7k4x9
Birth Position Printable: https://landing.mailerlite.com/webforms/landing/v3t6i9

You can also check out my 7-day pregnancy workout challenge: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRuFBUMIEg8Ab60Ha7S8l_pvtJ5RyaIm1

Pregnancy Yoga Playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRuFBUMIEg8AKiIJt_o3uk7234iif1TI8

Check with your doctor before trying any of these strategies or before starting this or any new exercise routine. Only do the movements safe for you in your pregnancy. You are responsible for your own safety. Full disclaimer at the bottom.

Disclaimer: This is general prenatal fitness only. Please check with your doctor or health care provider to see if this video is safe for you. You are responsible for your own safety. Don’t do anything that feels unsafe for you or baby. Stop if you have any pain or discomfort, bleeding, chest pain or shortness of breath, dizziness or if you feel unwell. P&P Health Inc., Pregnancy and Postpartum TV and Jessica Pumple are not liable in any way for any injury, loss, damages, costs or expenses suffered by you in relation to this video or its content. 


Jessica Pumple is a registered dietitian, and pre & postnatal fitness instructor.  She helps pregnant women stay fit, have healthy babies, and easier labors. She helps new moms with postpartum recovery, to heal and strengthen their core and lose the baby weight.

If you enjoy our content subscribe to our channel, hit the bell button, leave a comment, and share with your friends so I can make you more of the videos you enjoy!

channelDescription:
Passionate about spreading positivity, confidence and encouragement for a healthy and fit pregnancy, an easier delivery and fast recovery postpartum!

I have 400+ free pregnancy and postpartum workouts in many different styles: Yoga, HIIT, Pilates, Dance, Diastasis Recti Safe & More.

*Check out my Birth Education Playlist to create your positive and empowering birth experience.

*Heal and flatten your core after birth using my DIASTASIS RECTI Playlist.

I hope you find something helpful here on the channel and I’m so grateful to be able to share my passion and life with you!

Jessica Pumple
Registered Dietitian
Yoga & Fitness Instructor
Certified Pregnancy and Postpartum Core Exercise Specialist

Contact: support@pregnancyandpostpartumtv.com

comments: Just found out I’m pregnant with twins! So this was great to keep my body strong and my mind calm 😅

I am from Pakistan. 🇵🇰  I am only 5 weeks pregnant. Still scared if this is actually happening, if its gonna reach the finish line lol. Please make a prayer for me. This was a great workout. Thank you ❤
From Iran. I did all my workouts with my first baby with you. Thanks to you I was able to be a strong mom after birth. I'm now having my second one, and I'm still reaching out for your workouts ❤

Hello,
Doing this workout from Kitale, Kenya, Africa. I am a gym rat, but have been told to slow down. I found your workout friendly and relatable to the baby. I am 8 weeks 🤰
Hi! I'm from Ukraine. Glad to join your workouts. Thank You! It's keep me calm while it's not safe in my country and I feel a little bit fragile in my early terms of pregnancy
